nodes.title: Connect Four
nodes.excerpt: A pretty simple connect 4 game, I wanted to practice my JavaScript skills.
nodes.content:
Design and Development

A pretty simple connect 4 game, I wanted to practice my JavaScript skills.

Built with vanilla JavaScript and CSS for a clean, responsive design.

nodes.title: About Me
nodes.excerpt: Web developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites.
nodes.content:
About Me

I'm a web developer passionate about creating beautiful and functional websites.

I specialize in React, Gatsby, and modern web technologies.

When I'm not coding, I enjoy spending time with my family and exploring new technologies.

nodes.title: Professional Experience
nodes.excerpt: My journey in web development and the technologies I've worked with.
nodes.content:
Professional Experience

I have several years of experience in web development, working with various technologies and frameworks.

Technologies I work with:

  • React & Gatsby
  • JavaScript & TypeScript
  • Node.js & Express
  • WordPress & Headless CMS
  • CSS & SCSS

nodes.title: Wespire
nodes.excerpt: I was hired by Wespire to rebuild entirely their WordPress Website and implement new marketing tools as Hubspot.
nodes.content:
I was hired by Wespire to rebuild entirely their WordPress Website and implement new marketing tools as Hubspot.

Collaboration with their marketing team to implement new features and improve user experience.

nodes.title: Framer-Motion
nodes.excerpt: Playing with Framer Motion, I designed some SVG in Sketch and had fun with animations.
nodes.content:
Design and Development

Playing with Framer Motion, I designed some SVG in Sketch and had fun with animations.

Created interactive components and smooth transitions for better user experience.
